text:
No problem! Yeah it's a big leap but it's a really nice industry to work in, I feel like overall people are really friendly and laid back.

Not sure about matchmove in a reel, I'll ask our head of matchmove and see what she says.

She said this:
well he would be best off shooting a bit of film, an interesting camera move then tracking it put some cones on the points add a ground plane then chuck some cg in there, 1 shots would be enough if it was long and showed lots of different skills
or he could do a few shorter shots with harder camera moves and just cones on the points and a ground plane locked in for example
Also she mentioned there are some groups for Tracking & Matchmove on LinkedIn where they share reels. You could also check on Vimeo/Facebook groups for showreels.
